duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage sales activities and effectively promote company products/services to potential clients.
Travel to meet with clients and build strong, long-lasting relationships.
Negotiate and close sales deals while maintaining excellent customer satisfaction.
Demonstrate in-depth knowledge of company products and services to address client needs effectively.
Generate new leads and manage a pipeline of potential clients through strategic outreach.
Effectively communicate the value proposition through proposals and presentations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or equivalent experience
